example.eg: We change the sheets on the bed every week.
example.egtrans: 每个星期我们都换床单。

example.eg: A ream consists of 500 sheets of paper.
Lay a sheet of aluminium foil over the pan.
example.egtrans: 在盘子上盖一层铝箔纸。

example.eg: We baked the muffins on a cookie sheet.
example.egtrans: 我们用饼干烤板烤松饼。

example.eg: Because the window had an odd shape, we had to cut a new windowpane out of a larger sheet.
example.egtrans: 由于这个窗户的形状很奇特，所以我们不得不用一大张玻璃来剪裁出一个新的窗玻璃。

example.eg: The metalworker shaped the flat sheet of steel.
After the freezing rain, there is a sheet of ice covering the car.
The sheet broke in the storm, and the sailors struggled to repair it.
I bought three sheets of stamps at the post office.
Over millions of years one sheet of rock moved over the other.
example.egtrans: 数百万年的时间过去了，这块岩席发生了移动，越过了另一块。

example.eg: The rain was falling in sheets.
The company announced significant profits on the annual balance sheet.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 年度决算表, 年度资产负债表

example.eg: The attendance sheet will tell us if you are attending classes.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 签到单, 出席表, 考勤表

dsense.name: baking sheet, also US: cookie sheet, also UK: baking tray

example.eg: Non-stick baking sheets are much easier to clean. Place the fish on a baking tray and put it in the oven.
The balance sheet shows a healthy increase in profits.
example.egtrans: 资产负债表显示出利润有健康增长。

example.eg: At the hotel, they make sure to change the bed sheets every day.
The student hid a cheat sheet up his sleeve.
The teacher distributed cheat sheets to the class to help them study for the exam.
The goalie didn't let in a single goal, thus keeping his clean sheet.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 清白历史, 清白记录

dsense.name: clean sheet
dsense.guideword: UK (record with no broken rules, etc.)

example.eg: The cyclist was never caught cheating or doping; she had a clean sheet throughout her career.
I prefer a cookie sheet made from stainless steel, not aluminum.
The faxed document was five pages plus a cover sheet.
The student wrote out a crib sheet to help her revise for her exam.
example.egtrans: 这名学习做了一份小抄来帮助复习迎考。

example.eg: The stage manager has prepared a cue sheet for all the technicians.
Before you start painting the walls, please put down a drop cloth to protect the floors.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （家具等防灰尘等的）罩单, 防尘布

dsense.name: endpaper, also US: end paper, end leaf, end sheet, also UK: endleaf
dsense.guideword: (paper at front or back of a book)

example.eg: The fact sheet explains the pertinent details of the car.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 情况报道, 情况说明书

example.eg: Is this fitted sheet for the single bed or the double?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 尺寸合适的床单, 铺在最下层的床单

example.eg: It takes a little longer to make a bed with a flat sheet rather than a fitted sheet.
In the training materials, a flowchart of the standard procedure is included.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 流程图, 操作过程图

example.eg: Flowcharts can be used to visualize new algorithms.
example.egtrans: 程序图可使新算法更加具象化。

dsense.name: fly sheet, flysheet
dsense.guideword: (sheet put on horses to keep flies off) (用于放置蚊虫叮咬马匹)

example.eg: We pitched camp in the dark, and forgot to lay the ground sheet - we woke up sopping wet in the morning.
At one time an ice sheet covered most of the Northern part of the North American continent, now ice sheets only exist in Greenland and Antarctica.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 冰层, 冰原, 冰原

example.eg: The information sheet tells you how you should use the medicine.
Harry uses the layout sheet to plan the design of each page of the newsletter.
According to their accounting office, I'm still not on the pay sheet though I've been working there for weeks.
The proof sheets had several typographic errors which were corrected in the final printing.
Wilson has a rap sheet that includes several charges relating to drug dealing.

dsense.name: score sheet
dsense.guideword: (sport: page for recording results) (体育比赛)

example.eg: According to the score sheet I'm winning!
Cutting sheet glass is best left to expert professionals.
In the shipyard you could see stacks of sheet iron everywhere.
I used to run a machine that bent sheet metal into various shapes.
Harry found the sheet music for the song in the music shop.
She found a sheet of paper and wrote a note.  It will only require one sheet of paper to take this test. Pencils ready?

dsense.name: start with a clean slate, also UK: start with a clean sheet

trans_examp.trans_cn: 从头开始, 改过自新, 重新开始
工作时间记录表, 工时表

dsense.name: white as a sheet
dsense.guideword: informal, figurative (pale: from shock, fright, etc.) (非正式用语，比喻)

example.eg: You look like you've seen a ghost – you're white as a sheet!
Susan did the calculations on a worksheet and copied the answers onto the answer sheet.
The teacher handed round worksheets for the students to fill in.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 活页练习题, 练习册，练习簿

example.eg: The foreman referred to the worksheet to see which jobs were still outstanding.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 工作表, 工作登记表，工作记录表

example.eg: The accountant enters the figures on a worksheet before preparing the final statement.
